tool.name: Slice BAM
tool.command: ln -s "${input_bam}" temp_input.bam && ln -s "${input_bam.metadata.bam_index}" temp_input.bam.bai && samtools view -@ \${GALAXY_SLOTS:-1} -b -L "${input_interval}" temp_input.bam -o unsorted_output.bam && samtools sort unsorted_output.bam -O bam -T sorted -@ \${GALAXY_SLOTS:-1} -o "${output_bam}"
tool.help:
**What it does**
Accepts an input BAM file and an input BED file and creates an output BAM file containing only those alignments that overlap the provided BED intervals.
